Deena Metzger
July 2012

The Plight of the Elephant People

I dream that a conventional appearing middle class woman is calmly and confidently shooting two young lovers with a rifle. She shoots the young woman point blank and then turns the rifle on the young man who stands there horrified as he is shot...

Deena Metzger
Volume 31, issue 3: Dreaming Politics
